verses.roman:
jala bhare, ghara dhoya, kare hari-dhvani
'kṛṣṇa' 'hari' dhvani vinā āra nāhi śuni

synonyms: jala bhare—they were drawing water; ghara dhoya—washing the rooms; kare hari-dhvani—chanting the holy name of Hari; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; hari—the holy name of Hari; dhvani—vibration; vinā—except; āra—anything else; nāhi—there was not; śuni—hearing.
translation: Some people were filling the pots, and others were washing the rooms, but everyone was engaged in chanting the holy name of Kṛṣṇa and Hari.
